title: ODWeather
description: This is the api to access the ODWeather API information

actions.title: compareStation
actions.description:
Get forecast and realtime information for known points
None

actions.title: getAemetStation
actions.description:
Get data from the aemet stations
None

period.description: Period of time to get the data. Options: lastdata lastday

actions.title: getForecastPoints
actions.description:
Get forecast points of a yatchclub
None

inittime.description: initial date for the forecast ISO string YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:SS.SZ

endtime.description: end date for the forecast ISO string YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:SS.SZ

days.description: optional number of days in string. Will be added to init forecast date

hours.description: optional number of hours in string. Will be added to init forecast date

weather.description: Comma separated values for the weather parameteres temperature,rain,wind_u,wind_v,gust,pressure,cloud,humidity&wave=height,direction,period

wave.description: Comma separated values for the wave parameteres height,direction,period

entryid.description: Direct file I want to extract

actions.title: getSocibWeatherStation
actions.description:
Get data from the socib bahia de palma buoy
None

period.description: Period of time to get the data. Options: lastdata lasthour lastday

actions.title: getWeatherDisplay
actions.description:
Get data from the weather display software
None

period.description: Period of time to get the data latestdata|latesthour|latestday|dailylog
